lcMultipleSelect.lcQuestion: The <prereq> element is for... (pick all that apply)

lcAnswerOption.lcAnswerContent: Providing background information about the task
Listing items needed to complete the task
Explaining the purpose of the task
Containing the body content of the task

lcMultipleSelect.lcFeedbackIncorrect: The <prereq> element is for prerequisite information, such as items needed to complete the task. The <context> element provides background information or explains the purpose of the task, and the <taskbody> element contains the body content of the task.
